title: Bajaj Auto sales jump 20 pc to 4,69,531 units in September
description: Bajaj Auto's vehicle sales rose by 20% to 4,69,531 units in September 2024 from 3,92,558 units last year. Domestic sales increased 23% to 3,11,887 vehicles, while exports grew 13% to 1,57,644 units. Two-wheeler sales surged 22% to 4,00,489 units, with domestic sales up 28% and exports up 13%. Commercial vehicle sales rose 6%.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
